name: Mind Dot
description: Mind Dot is a challenging yet relaxing match-3 puzzle game where players must use their strategic thinking to rotate and move various pieces in order to solve puzzles. With each level, the difficulty increases as new obstacles and challenges are introduced. The game features an elegant and minimalist design, vibrant colors, and smooth animations. The objective of the game is to use all game pieces in order to fill the board in the exact pattern indicated by the game. As players progress, the levels become more challenging with new obstacles. With its easy to learn but hard to master gameplay, "Mind Dot" is a perfect game for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages. It will test your mind and reflexes as you strategize to fill the board, and leave you wanting for more.
